title: The Soviet schoolchild
creator_credit: Soviet War Film Agency, Moscow Central News Reel Studios and Ministry of Information
brief_description: Soviet education from nursery schools to technical institutes and universities, showing the subjects taught and the methods of teaching at each type of school. The schools shown are situated in many different parts of the USSR.
